title: What is a natural antibiotic for strep throat? - Quora

response.answer_text: Strep throat is an infection by streptococcus. It goes away on its own, but antibiotics are usually prescribed to prevent it turning into rheumatic fever. Rheumatic fever can chew up your heart valves which may eventually have to be repaired or replaced. There are “natural” treatments for strep throat which may, more or less, help your immune system fight the infection, but only antibiotics do the job for sure. Rheumatic fever is too big a price to pay to keep things natural.

Go to the grocery store and purchase 3 blocks of GORGONZOLA CHEESE. Eat 3 pieces of this per day. It doesn’t matter if you don’t like the taste, it will help you. Also purchase GARLIC supplement from the Health store and take one tablet per day. That will cure your problem.
